TEXT.TITLE: PENGUIN GROUP <PGC> REPORTS ORDERS
TEXT.BODY: Penguin Group Inc said it told a group of analysts that it has started to book orders for its L'Ectronique line of costume jewelery and The Simplifier, a device which employs artificial intelligence to make computers easy to use. Penguin officials were not available to comment on the potential market of these products. Reuter
